title: Simplify CLI to 4 Core VM Management Actions
summary: Streamline the Nebula CLI to focus exclusively on four essential VM management operations: start VM, list VMs, stop VM, and update SSH config.

success_criteria.text: CLI has exactly 4 commands: start-vm, list-vms, stop-vm, update-ssh-config
Each command works correctly with GCP VM instances
CLI is easy to use and understand

acceptance_checks.text: CLI accepts exactly 4 commands: start-vm, list-vms, stop-vm, update-ssh-config
Each command can be run independently from command line
Commands work with GCP authentication and VM management
SSH config update functionality works with VM external IPs
Documentation is updated to reflect simplified structure
No API service management or complex tool system remains

subtasks: Analyze current CLI structure and identify removable components
Design new simplified CLI with 4 core commands
Update documentation and remove outdated references

decisions: Replaced complex CLI with simple 4-command interface
